sourcesContent:
Customer Form

A valid email is required

You submitted the following:

firstname
{{ customer.firstname }}
gender
{{ customer.gender }}
lastname
{{ customer.lastname }}

email
{{ customer.email }}
country_Code
{{ customer.country_Code }}
balance
{{ customer.balance }}

phone_Number
{{ customer.phone_Number }}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { Customer } from '../customer'; import { CommonModule, CurrencyPipe } from '@angular/common'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-customer', templateUrl: './add-customer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-customer.component.css'] }) export class AddCustomerComponent { customer: Customer = {} as Customer; isSubmitted = false; Genders = ["M", "F", "O"]; formattedAmount: string | null =''; constructor(private currencyPipe: CurrencyPipe,private http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') private baseUrl: string) { } transformAmount(element: any) { this.formattedAmount = this.currencyPipe.transform(this.customer.balance, '$'); element.target.value = this.formattedAmount; } public clear() { this.customer = {} as Customer; } public onSubmit() { this.http.post(this.baseUrl + 'customer',this.customer).subscribe(result => { this.customers = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } }
